projects.title: BlueShip
projects.info: BlueShip is a financial industry mobile app developed in Ionic, React, Typescript, NodeJS/Express, and MongoDB. It aims to be an all-in-one platform for tracking asset performance, including stocks, cryptocurrencies, and exchange-traded funds (ETF).

projects.title: Veracruz
projects.info: E-commerce clothing store built with JavaScript utilizing React.js, Node.js, Bumbag UI, and PayPal API.

projects.title: Check app
projects.info: Full-stack desktop application that keeps track of weekly activities using virtual-like sticky notes. The front-end was built with React.js, React DnD, Tailwind CSS, Axios, and hosted on Netlify. The back-end was developed Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, and hosted on Heroku.

projects.title: Fibonacci
projects.info: Application that compares the speed complexity of the Fibonacci algorythm using recursion and iteration. Developed with React.js, Chart.js, and vanilla CSS.

projects.title: 7GUIs
projects.info: Multi-task app that represents typical challenges in GUI programming by the Leibniz Universit√§t Hannover. Vanilla JavaScript was the language chosen to accomplish the challenges.
